title: More of this in the splashes please
body:
https://rgmerch-a.akamaihd.net/products/production/1043-00-00/2018-09-07%2000:02:52.377_gpmf.png

https://merch.riotgames.com/en_US/product/gangplank-vs-miss-fortune-poster

Good job Riot. There needs to be more of this in the game. This is what league was built upon when I started playing. 

http://lol-wallpapers.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/Classic-Evelynn-Splash-Art-Old-League-of-Legends-Artwork-Wallpaper-lol-2.jpg

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-S3FCHdi47gc/UCybPXDX22I/AAAAAAAADqk/OjZKDRFaldw/s1600/gVX2R.jpg

http://lolwp.com/wp-content/uploads/Sona_Splash_0.jpg

https://gamepedia.cursecdn.com/lolesports_gamepedia_en/2/28/Elise_Splash_0.jpg

https://assets.change.org/photos/2/ue/gu/oouEGUlSLVMikWh-1600x900-noPad.jpg

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/gFM78Qk9CT8/maxresdefault.jpg

You had all these cartoonishly huge boobs with a cartoonish emphasis on cleavage. And you know what? That was when League was at it's popularity height. Is it any wonder League is precipitously dying?
